review: I am generally happy with my purchase of the Fire Stick. It's great to get all my Amazon choices directly on my hdtv, but I think I still have to learn more about navigating around Fire tv. The plug in process is as easy as expected; I just had to understand how to navigate my tv's source list. I also have to figure out how to access all my photos that I have in the amazon cloud; not sure how to do that and will have to look on line for more info on all the navigation and access. All in all, I highly recommend the Fire TV stick since if you all ready have Prime etc, why not enjoy it all on your tv for such a small price?
